title: Justice Incarnate
description: Whoever said, "you only live once" didn't know Jaden Michaels. Attacked by an evil nobleman in 1066, her life took a dramatic detour. In the following millennium, she's lived repeatedly with one goal: eliminate the demon that preys on women and children. Now, in 2096, Jaden must fight to find the one weapon that will banish him forever.
author: Regan Black
